messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_agenda_20251104",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Agenda (2025-11-04).docx",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T10:05:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Agenda
Date: Tuesday, 2025-11-04
Time: 10:00–10:45 (Asia/Tokyo)
Location: Zoom (link in calendar invite)
Participants: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Engineer), Sam Williams (Senior Engineer)
Related Project: WEB - Website Redesign

Objectives:
- Align on overall scope for the Website Redesign ahead of the Planning milestone on 2025-11-10.
- Review current status of WEB-100 and WEB-101.
- Identify design and engineering dependencies and risks before Development (2025-11-20).

Agenda (45 minutes):
1. Context and goals for the Website Redesign (5 min)
2. Jira review
   - WEB-100: Website Redesign - Initial Setup (status: Done)
   - WEB-101: Website Redesign - Core Feature (status: In Progress)
3. Planning milestone details (15 min)
   - Deliverables due by 2025-11-10
   - Acceptance criteria and owners
4. Dependencies and risks (15 min)
   - Design handoffs
   - Backend/API dependencies
   - QA and launch readiness (for 2025-11-30 Launch)
5. Next steps and action items (5 min)

Pre-reads:
- WEB Jira board filtered to WEB-100, WEB-101
- Website Redesign high-level requirements (Confluence)

Notes:
- Please come prepared with any known blockers or questions around WEB-101 implementation.
- Decisions and action items will be captured in a separate meeting notes document."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_notes_template_20251104",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Notes (2025-11-04).docx",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T10:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting Notes
Date: Tuesday, 2025-11-04
Time: 10:00–10:45 (Asia/Tokyo)
Location: Zoom
Organizer: Alex Smith (PM)
Participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams
Related Project: WEB - Website Redesign
Milestone: Planning (due 2025-11-10)

1. Meeting Objectives
- Review scope for Website Redesign and confirm Planning milestone deliverables.
- Review status of WEB-100 (Initial Setup) and WEB-101 (Core Feature).
- Identify design/engineering dependencies before Development (2025-11-20).

2. Discussion Notes
2.1 Project Overview
- 

2.2 Jira Status Review
- WEB-100: Website Redesign - Initial Setup
  Status: Done
  Notes:
- WEB-101: Website Redesign - Core Feature
  Status: In Progress
  Notes:

2.3 Planning Milestone Details (2025-11-10)

- Open questions:

2.4 Dependencies & Risks

- Engineering/backend dependencies:
- Testing/QA and Launch (2025-11-30) considerations:

3. Decisions

5. Follow-Ups
- Schedule any required deep-dive sessions for WEB-101.
- Update WEB project plan and Jira board based on agreed scope.

(These notes will be updated live during the meeting and shared with all participants afterward.)"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_milestone_brief_20251110",
      "name": "WEB Planning Milestone - Scope & Deliverables Brief.docx",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T10:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Project: Website Redesign
Milestone: Planning
Milestone Date: 2025-11-10
Subsequent Milestones: Development (2025-11-20), Launch (2025-11-30)
Owner: Alex Smith (PM)

1. Purpose
This brief summarizes the scope, assumptions, and deliverables for the Website Redesign Planning milestone. It will be reviewed and finalized in the "WEB Website Redesign - Planning Meeting" on 2025-11-04.

2. In-Scope (Planning Milestone)
- Finalize user flows and high-level IA for the new website.
- Confirm MVP scope for the Launch milestone (2025-11-30).
- Align engineering estimates and dependencies for WEB-101 and follow-up tickets.

3. Out-of-Scope (for Planning Milestone)
- Detailed UI visual design sign-off (tracked separately in design system docs).
- Non-MVP enhancements targeted for post-launch.

4. Current Jira Status
- WEB-100: Website Redesign - Initial Setup
  Status: Done
  Description: Project skeleton, base repo, CI configuration.

- WEB-101: Website Redesign - Core Feature
  Status: In Progress
  Description: Implementation of core feature set for redesign.

5. Deliverables by 2025-11-10
- Documented and agreed scope for Website Redesign (MVP vs. stretch).
- Updated Jira tickets and estimates for WEB-101 and related follow-up issues.
- List of design and backend dependencies required before Development (2025-11-20).

6. Risks & Assumptions (Draft)
- Assumption: Dedicated engineering capacity is available between 2025-11-20 and 2025-11-30 for Development and Launch.
- Risk: Delays in finalizing requirements could impact WEB-101 timeline.

7. Next Steps
- Review this brief in the 2025-11-04 planning meeting.
- Capture any decisions and updates in the meeting notes document.
- Share finalized brief with stakeholders by 2025-11-10."
    }
  ]
}
